#summary Useful instructions about upgrade.

In this page you can find useful instructions to update your current version of photoDiary to the latest one.

Don't forget to backup your mySQL DB and your "shots" folder before upgrading.


===UPDATE TO v1.3===
  # backup your mySQL DB and the "shots" folder containing your pictures
  # download the ZIP file from [http://code.google.com/p/photodiary/downloads/list download page]
  # upload all files and overwrite the existing one except the following files and folders:
    ** configuration file "common/config.php"
    ** pictures folder "shots"
  # DONE!
